snippet: Former New England Patriots star Aaron Hernandez has a new legal team to defend him in the 2012 slayings of two men outside a Boston nightclub....
lead_paragraph: Former New England Patriots star Aaron Hernandez has a new legal team to defend him in the 2012 slayings of two men outside a Boston nightclub.

headline.main: New Legal Team Granted for Ex-NFL Star Aaron Hernandez
headline.print_headline: New Legal Team Granted for Ex-NFL Star Aaron Hernandez
